amendment.description: To require a study of membership criteria for federally recognized Indian tribes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4029 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4029 proposed by Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 3899. (consideration: CR S992, S997, S1040) To require a study of membership criteria for federally recognized Indian tribes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4029 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4029 proposed by Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 3899.
